eb4d47b3-a53d-4d8d-bbcb-9d0c35a10f7c.description: This badge has been issued to the candidates who have demonstrated their unwavering commitment to lifelong learning, which is vitally important in today's ever-changing and expanding digital world. It also identifies the qualities of an open, disciplined, and constantly evolving mind, capable of using and contributing knowledge to develop a more equal and better world.

badge_template_activities.title: Be a continuous and focused learner.

Want to boost their professional growth.

f8b36f21-c8bd-4358-be4b-684facaf36ea.description: Holders of this certification have validated their knowledge of the Scrum framework and have achieved a superior knowledge base and skill set by achieving certification in Scrum roles. They have a professional background of at least two years in scrum and have demonstrated and justified how they have used the theoretical knowledge to achieve real-world project objectives and the benefits this has brought to the business.
f8b36f21-c8bd-4358-be4b-684facaf36ea.name: Scrum Advanced Professional Certificate -SAPC

badge_template_activities.title: You must have completed all the Scrum framework certifications:  Scrum Foundations Professional Certificate or equivalent, Scrum Master Professional Certificate or equivalent, Scrum Product Owner Professional Certificate or equivalent and Scrum Developer Professional Certificate or equivalent.

You must have worked professionally under the Scrum framework for at least two years. You have to submit an essay explaining that you have experience using the practices of the Scrum framework. This essay should explain and justify how you have used the theoretical knowledge of Scrum to achieve the objectives of a real-world project and what benefits it has brought to your company.

1d0a963b-e04c-455f-a168-897088e7a1c7.description: DevOps Culture Certified Trainers earners have the awareness to facilitate DevOps Culture simulation, run effective debriefing with their group and connect learning from the simulation with solutions to real-life challenges in their organization. Using DevOps with Lego and Chocolate simulation, they make DevOps culture experience accessible to all – business stakeholders, C-level executives, IT management, techies and non-techies alike.
1d0a963b-e04c-455f-a168-897088e7a1c7.name: DevOps Culture Certified Trainer

alignments.name: Introduction to DevOps with Chocolate, LEGO and Scrum Game
alignments.description: "Embracing a new culture is hard, but not for people who learn about DevOps culture through DevOps with Lego and Chocolate simulation. Now it’s your turn! Have fun, change mindsets, enable DevOps transformation success stories.This certification has been created by Dana Pylayeva, Agile Play Consulting, NY, USA.

badge_template_activities.title: Earners must have participated in DevOps Culture Simulation (with Lego and Chocolate) in the past 2 years via Agile Play Consulting, LLC or CertiProf® registered partners and be a current DCPC holder.
Badge holders have passed a multiple choice exam, scoring a minimum of 12 out of 20 (60%). The exam is a closed-book exam lasting 60 minutes.

dcd1cb3e-061e-4a1c-af64-4ec411d78421.description: DevOps Culture Practitioner Certificate earners have truly grasp the essence and benefits of DevOps culture as well as help their organizations to avoid typical DevOps adoption anti-patterns. dcd1cb3e-061e-4a1c-af64-4ec411d78421.name: DevOps Culture Practitioner Certificate

6f674a0d-933c-40e2-98b0-e137d182b288.description: Artificial Intelligence Expert certification holders understand the fundamental keys of the deep learning approach, practical bases of architecture, and convergence of neural networks. They have demonstrated how to master the methodologies for setting up neural networks, the strengths, and limitations of existing tools and libraries.
6f674a0d-933c-40e2-98b0-e137d182b288.name: Artificial Intelligence Expert Certificate - CAIEC®

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holders have passed a multiple choice exam, scoring a minimum of 32 out of 40 (80%). The exam is a closed-book exam lasting 60 minutes.

32c4cae1-1182-4762-afad-f85bad2e1604.description: As a co-creator, the earner of this badge has the key knowledge, skills, and values necessary to understand and work with DevOps Advanced Certified Professional. They are familiarized with DevOps practices in the following three forms: Flow, Feedback, Learning, and Experimentation. They understand DevOps concepts and the value this approach can contribute to their organizations.
32c4cae1-1182-4762-afad-f85bad2e1604.name: DevOps Advanced Content Co-Creator

badge_template_activities.title: This holder possess an extensive experience and expertise in DevOps Advanced to be considered as Co-Creator.

bd3e9a04-c2df-4364-8777-382a4d359706.description: The Data Storytelling Professional Certification holders understand the importance of analyzing data and being able to explain this information through insights and deliver it to the end customer. They have also learned the importance of reviewing the methodological steps needed to tell stories with data, thus promoting organizational changes and innovations required by today's society.
bd3e9a04-c2df-4364-8777-382a4d359706.name: Data Storytelling Professional Certification - DSTPC

badge_template_activities.title: Badge holders have passed a multiple choice exam, scoring a minimum of 32 out of 40 (80%). The exam is a closed-book exam lasting 60 minutes.

74e4b37d-703d-46a5-903d-2efa44e4281c.description: As a co-creator, the earner of this badge has the key knowledge, skills, and values necessary to understand and work with User Stories, and acknowledge the importance of User Stories for the job market. 34489350-0208-4bd9-a54c-19b9ac890bfd.description: As a co-creator, the earner of this badge has the key knowledge, skills, and values necessary to understand and work with Artificial Intelligence. This co-creator has demonstrated how to use the data analysis for decision-making and understand the limits of algorithms.
